The main event was Team nWo (Kevin Nash, Scott Hall, Hollywood Hogan \u0026 Randy Savage) versus Team Piper (Roddy Piper, Chris Benoit, Steve McMichael \u0026 Jeff Jarrett) versus Team WCW (Lec Luger, The Giant \u0026 Scott Steiner) in a Triangle Elimination Match.
